title: IT'S MY BIRTHDAY! Taco Storm PLAY WITH ME PLEASEEE!!!! :3
body: It's my birthday and I always wanted to play with a Rioter. If you can't I understand cause I'm sure you're a busy person, but it would be really awesome if you did :) Please and thank you?

replies.body:
Oh jeez, I don't play on NA anymore T_T

I can play with you, but my ping will be ATROCIOUS, so an ARAM would probs be best. When works for you?
